meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Omigod! That puppy is so cute!
meanings.sent2: Oh my goodness, omigod, I can't believe I won!
meanings.sent3: Omigod, did you see that squirrel do a backflip?
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, and omigod, it was like magic!
meanings.sent5: As the curtain rose, omigod, the audience gasped in amazement.

meanings.definition: Used informally to show disbelief or shock.
meanings.sent1: Omigod, I can't believe you ate the whole pizza!
meanings.sent2: Wow, omigod, that movie ending was unexpected!
meanings.sent3: Omigod, did you hear that the cat can talk?
meanings.sent4: The storm hit with such force, omigod, it was like nature's fury unleashed!
meanings.sent5: The news of the alien invasion spread like wildfire, omigod, causing panic in the streets.
